options.content: ### Version of Different colours üü©üü®üü¶ are different versions. Move a cursor üëÜto the head of the line to get version info.

flowchart LR
    A(‚öôÔ∏è Cached Jobs) ==> B(‚úÖ Queued)

targets.expr:
100 * (
  (  sum(rate(youtrack_TotalCachingJobsEnqueued{  instance=~"$instance" }[$__interval:]))
+
sum(rate(youtrack_TotalCachingCountJobsEnqueued{  instance=~"$instance" }[$__interval:]))
 )
  -
  (  sum(rate(youtrack_TotalCachingJobsEnqueued{  instance=~"$instance" }[$__interval:] offset ${offset}))
+
sum(rate(youtrack_TotalCachingCountJobsEnqueued{  instance=~"$instance" }[$__interval:] offset ${offset}))
 )
)
/
( sum(rate(youtrack_TotalCachingJobsEnqueued{  instance=~"$instance" }[$__interval:] offset ${offset}))
+
sum(rate(youtrack_TotalCachingCountJobsEnqueued{  instance=~"$instance" }[$__interval:] offset ${offset}))
 )

100 * (
  (  sum(rate(youtrack_TotalCachingJobsEnqueued{  instance=~"$instance" }[$__interval:]))
+
sum(rate(youtrack_TotalCachingCountJobsEnqueued{  instance=~"$instance" }[$__interval:]))
 )
  -
  (  sum(rate(youtrack_TotalCachingJobsEnqueued{  instance=~"$instance" }[$__interval:] offset ${offset}))
+
sum(rate(youtrack_TotalCachingCountJobsEnqueued{  instance=~"$instance" }[$__interval:] offset ${offset}))
 )
)
/
( sum(rate(youtrack_TotalCachingJobsEnqueued{  instance=~"$instance" }[$__interval:] offset ${offset}))
+
sum(rate(youtrack_TotalCachingCountJobsEnqueued{  instance=~"$instance" }[$__interval:] offset ${offset}))
 )
